text: Efrem Zimbalist, Sr. ( February 22, 1985) was a Russian-American violinist, composer, teacher, and conductor. He was director of the Curtis Institute of Music. He was married to Alma Gluck. He was the father of actor Efrem Zimbalist, Jr.. Zimbalist, Sr. died at the age of 94 from natural causes. ==References== Category:1890 births Category:1985 deaths Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:Russian musicians Category:American violinists Category:American composers Category:Academics from Pennsylvania Category:Educators from Nevada Category:Writers from Nevada Category:Musicians from Nevada Category:People from Reno, Nevada
title: Efrem Zimbalist Sr.
